response.original_title: Christmas Morning Service from Blackburn Cathedral
response.overview: A lively Christmas morning family Eucharist from Blackburn Cathedral, capturing the wonder of the Nativity journey with a liturgy of music, readings and stories, and featuring the uplifting setting of Bob Chilcott’s A Little Jazz Mass.  The cathedral choir of girls, boys and adult singers leads the congregation in familiar carols, including O Come All Ye Faithful, See Amid the Winter’s Snow, I Saw Three Ships, Ding Dong Merrily on High and Hark! The Herald Angels Sing.
response.title: Christmas Morning Service from Blackburn Cathedral
